Question & Options:
In the movie 'Fifty Shades Freed' (2017), which of the following statements about its soundtrack are true?
Options:
A. A. The soundtrack debuted at #5 on the Billboard 200 chart.
B. B. The soundtrack had 58,000 equivalent album units.
C. C. The soundtrack was released in 2016.
D. D. The soundtrack features songs by various artists.
